meanings.definition: The state of being unfortunate or unlucky.
meanings.sent1: Her haplessness in finding a job was disheartening.
meanings.sent2: The haplessness of the situation left everyone feeling down.
meanings.sent3: Despite her haplessness, she kept a positive attitude.
meanings.sent4: The haplessness of the weather mirrored his mood.
meanings.sent5: The haplessness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.

meanings.definition: Lacking in luck or good fortune.
meanings.sent1: The haplessness cat always seemed to get into trouble.
meanings.sent2: Their haplessness attempts at fishing never yielded any catch.
meanings.sent3: The haplessness puppy kept tripping over its own paws.
meanings.sent4: The haplessness student could never seem to pass a test.
meanings.sent5: The haplessness day ended with a broken umbrella and missed bus.
